faqs.question: How do I use the Settings and Updates Panel?
faqs.answer:
### Settings Panel Overview
The Settings and Updates Panel provides configuration options and update management for the Cats Blender Plugin.

[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wikicurrent/settings1.png[/image]

### General Settings
**Export Options**
- Embed Textures: Include textures in exported files
- Remove Rigidbodies/Joints: Clean physics during export
- Export Translation CSV: Generate translation files
- Custom Export Directory: Set preferred save location

### Language Settings
**Interface Language**
- Multiple language support
- Real-time UI translation
- Custom language file support
- Translation management tools

### Debug Options
**Maintenance Tools**
- Reset Google Dictionary
- Translation debugging (Dev branch)
- System cache cleanup
- Configuration reset options

### Update Management
**Version Control**
- Update notifications
- Automatic update checks
- Version compatibility info
- Release notes access

[note]Changes to certain settings require a Blender restart to take effect.[/note]

[warning]The Dev branch features are intended for development and testing purposes only.[/warning]
